description: Non-material amendment to planning permission PP/22/06152 (Rear extension at lower-ground, ground (involving creation of a conservatory), alterations to front windows at lower-ground floor, first and roof levels,  like-for-like replacement of the roof and minor alterations to the front and rear roofslopes, and associated works) to Increase in dimensions of main roof skylights (W25 and W28) and slight relocation of W26 W27 to comply with Building Regulations standards. Roof covering at rear ground floor level changing from paving slabs to pebbles and addition of low-level planter. Roof covering at rear second floor level changing from paving slabs to pebbles. Addition of planters to boundary of approved roof terrace at first floor level.
